creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: light brown background; two vertical panels; top half has four horizontal rows and bottom has six horizontal rows of embroidered stylized bird and flowers in pink, light green, purple and red; separated by horizontal strip of geometric design in peach, light green and black; plain brown border
